views.markdown:
* Fixed BTstack connection issues * Improved audio re-sampling accuracy * Added more options to control frame rate and color quality * New Prescale 2x effect, sharp edges at any zoom level with linear filter
* Experimental support for hardware keyboards via the Apple Bluetooth stack
* iPhone 6 & 6 Plus screen size support
* MFi game controller support
* Improved speed & quality for hq2x shader
* New Scale2x shader
* Option to show only game content on external display
* Option to use an automatically created save path specific to each system
* Reorganized a few options and made other UI tweaks
* Added bundled game Motocross Challenge from developer David Doucet
* Fixed iOS 7 status bar issue
* Key repeat for bluetooth controllers
* hq2x shader (WIP)
* Other small tweaks & fixes
* Movable On-screen Controls
* Various UI tweaks
* Fix options related crashing

* Cheat code support
* PS3 controller support
* Other minor tweaks
* IPS patch support
* Unbind keys by pushing Left on a Bluetooth controller
* Compatible with Blutrol
* Other minor changes
* RTC on/off option
* New audio back-end to fix issues with iOS 6.x
* Wii U Pro Controller support
* New Integer-only zoom option affecting only height
* Various other fixes/tweaks
* Replaced Key Configs for Wiimotes, iCade, etc. with Input Device Setup menu providing per-device settings
* iPhone 5 screen support
* Date & time listed in save state slot menu
* iCade fix and some minor tweaks

* Custom save path option
* Fixed zip file load error
* Fix a possible crash and display composed text (accent marks, Korean, etc.) correctly

* Fixed saves in Pokemon Mystery Dungeon (European version)
* 7zip (.7z) file support
* Unicode text support (Japanese, etc.)
* Other minor tweaks/fixes, including proper iOS 6 orientation handling
* Auto load state prompt
* Bluetooth scan fixes
* Fixed auto-frameskip lockup
* Sound buffer size option to control latency and reduced latency in general
* Option to show/hide status bar
